channel.title: Slight on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Slight on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Slight
item.description: when the lovers dance And are swept by Guiding glances of Sad sunlight The gods simple mocking Of afternoon pleasures Holidays that are never Realized. They Came to stay. Led astray. They Lie awake. Stranded takes. Misty ghosts dance upon Misty houses broken down They laugh and flee. There is no glee. A coward’s paradise.
